goal.ch: 本課程為環境研究專業科目的入門課程，著重於廣泛與普遍的說明多項環境問題、成因與解決之道，如能源與資源的耗竭、空氣污染、水污染、廢棄物處理、臭氧層破洞、全球氣候變遷等，培養學生全面性的概念，引導學生了解環境與人類生活之關聯以及環境保護之重要性。
goal.en: This is an introductory level course for students who are interested in environmental research. This course emphasizes environmental science and the interrelationships between humans and the environment. Topics include: introduction to sustainability, components and functions of ecosystems, human population, environmental toxicology, energy and fossil fuels, nuclear power, renewable energy, resources, air pollution, water pollution, solid and hazardous wastes, and global climate change.
